description:
The younger leader of a group of bandits. Daughter of Cordyline. She is a sarcastic and rebellious teenager who takes her job seriously, though she is not as serious as her mother. Originally planning to kidnap Ceres and Dagmyer in Havoniwa, they and the rest of the bandits were later recruited by Dagmyer to participate in the invasion of the Holy Land.
Source: Wiki
name: Ran
